Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia Phillies (80-56) and the Atlanta Braves (74-62) are set to face off on September 1, 2024, at 7:10 p.m. ET.
The game will take place at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
The match will be broadcast on ESPN and can be streamed on Fubo.
Phillies vs. Braves Starting Pitchers: Aaron Nola (RHP) for the Philadelphia Phillies and Spencer Schwellenbach (RHP) for the Atlanta Braves.
Phillies vs. Braves Team Stats: The Phillies rank ninth-best in MLB play with 163 total home runs.
The Braves rank fourth in Major League Baseball with 179 home runs.
Philadelphia's.257 batting average is fourth-best in MLB.
Atlanta ranks 16th in MLB with a.242 team batting average.
The Phillies score the ninth-most runs in baseball (656 total, 4.8 per game).
The Braves have scored 587 runs (4.3 per game) this season, which ranks 17th in MLB.
Hitters To Watch In Phillies vs. Braves: Alec Bohm, Bryce Harper, Kyle Schwarber, Nicholas Castellanos, and Trea Turner for the Philadelphia Phillies.
Marcell Ozuna, Matt Olson, Jorge Soler, Orlando Arcia, and Travis d'Arnaud for the Atlanta Braves.
